headline: LOW Q1 Earnings Call: Pro Segment Strength, E-commerce Expansion, and Strategic Acquisition Drive Outlook
summary: Home improvement retailer Lowe’s (NYSE:LOW) met the market’s revenue expectations in Q1 CY2025. Its non-GAAP EPS of $2.92 per share was 1.5% above analysts’ consensus estimates.
